faqDescription:
Beginning December 16, 2021, if you have purchased the Far Cry 6 Season Pass, Gold Edition, or Ultimate Edition through Epic Games Store you can add Far Cry 3: Blood Dragon to your library for free.

You will need to add Far Cry 3: Blood Dragon to your cart and check out to add the game to your library. You will not be charged for the transaction.
Eligibility
You are eligible to redeem a free copy of Far Cry 3: Blood Dragon if you have purchased one of the following products from Epic Games Store:
  • Far Cry 6 Season Pass
  • Far Cry 6 Gold Edition
  • Far Cry 6 Ultimate Edition
Redemption
If you own one of the eligible products listed above, please follow these steps to redeem your copy of Far Cry 3: Blood Dragon:
  1. Make sure you are signed in to your account at Epic Games Store.
  2. Visit the product detail page for Far Cry 3: Blood Dragon.
  3. Click Buy Now to add the game to your cart.
  4. Make sure the total price of the game is displayed as $0.00 in your cart. If not, contact Support for assistance before finalizing your transaction.
  5. Click the Place Order button to complete your order.
Your copy of Far Cry 3: Blood Dragon will now appear in your library.
Troubleshooting FAQ
Q: The Far Cry 3: Blood Dragon product detail page does not show that the game is free. Should I still add it to my cart?
A: Yes, as long as you own one of the eligible products and are signed in to your Epic Games Store account Far Cry 3: Blood Dragon will show as free once placed in your cart.
Q: I added Far Cry 3: Blood Dragon to my cart, but the total price displayed is not $0.00. Should I go ahead and place my order?
A: No, please contact Support for assistance before finalizing your order.
Q: I purchased Far Cry 3: Blood Dragon through Epic Games Store prior to my purchase of one of the eligible Far Cry 6 products. Can I request a refund for that purchase?
A: If you purchased Far Cry 3: Blood Dragon from Epic Games Store within the past 14 days and have less than 2 hours of runtime on record you may be eligible for a refund. Please visit the Epic Games Store Refund Policy page for more details and instructions for submitting a refund request.
